title: Some Good Questions Concerning Christianity
description:
In this video, I read a blog post by Nathan Ormond (Digital Gnosis) where he touches on some thoughts he has concerning Christianity. I really liked and identify with Nathan's concerns. This was a really good post (although, perhaps, poorly written); I'm glad I came across it. 

Nathan's post: https://nathanormond.wordpress.com/blog/

My Writing: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/

This is episode 54 of my podcast. 

There is an audio version of my videos (on all podcast platforms): https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

About Me: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/about?utm_source=menu-dropdown
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/officialcoltonkirby/
Odysee: https://odysee.com/@ColtonKirby
